synopsis.text: Higuchi Eri, Hoshi Asami, Saotome Shizuno, Tachibana Shion, and Hiraoka Yuu are five aspiring idols who invite you to join them in their fitness journey! Each episode showcases a diverse range of workout routines, from classic push-ups and sit-ups to graceful yoga, dance, and tai chi. As they engage in spine twists, stretches, and trunk training, these young women strive to shed body fat and sculpt their bodies for the stage. By exercising alongside them, you'll not only improve your own physical fitness but also form a bond with these idols-in-training. Prepare to move your soul and body in this unique and energetic anime!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
